row.entry: An administrator-defined name for the server group. The name is used to link server-groups together and to identify server-groups to be used as failure zones in a control-plane. (see )
A list of server-group names that are nested below this group in the hierarchy. Each server group can only be listed in one other server group (that is in a strict tree topology).
A list of network names (see ). See for a description of how networks are matched to servers via server groups.
